name: Quizzler
description:
Quizzler is a brain quiz that will help you improve your culture and jog your memory. With 5 different themes to choose from, you can spend a lot of time playing this game (even with your friends!). Try and challenge them for a duel!


º Click in the answer you feel it's the right one.
º Increase your score and highscore

º 450 total questions available
º 5 themes to choose from (Languages, Arts, History,  Sciences and Leisure)
º Color coded themes to help navigation
º Score system to let you know how you went in the game
º Highscore system to let you improve your score
º more to come...

º Multitheme option including all questions in the game.
º More topics!
º More levels of difficulty
º Timed questions
º 20/20 questions
º English translations (other languages might appear later on, as well)
º Android version of the game
º Achievements (Extra fun!)

At the moment the game is only available for Windows.
An Android version is currently in development.
